item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, Octopath Traveler 0, more
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Assassin's Creed Shadows and Red Dead Redemption ports, etc.

Metroid Prime 4: Beyond for Switch 2 and Switch, and Octopath Traveler 0 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, and Switch are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases.

Also due out this week is the Switch 2 version of Assassin’s Creed Shadows, and the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, iOS, and Android versions of Red Dead Redemption.

Various downloadable content and updates are also due out this week, including Gran Turismo 7‘s “Power Pack” and Tekken 8‘s new playable character Miary Zo.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Physical

  • Animal Well (PS5, Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
    • Asian Version (PS5, Switch)
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows (Switch 2) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch 2)
    • European Version (Switch 2)
  • Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes Edition (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
  • Azura’s Crystals (PS5, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5)
  • CROSS CHANNEL ~For all people~ (Switch)
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Football Manager 26 Console (PS5) – Already available worldwide.
  • Football Manager 26 Touch (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Metroid Prime 4: Beyond (Switch 2, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch 2, Switch)
    • European Version (Switch 2, Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch 2, Switch)
  • Nightmare: The Lunatic (Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Collector’s Edition (Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (Switch)
      • Collector’s Edition (Switch)
  • Octopath Traveler 0 (PS5, Switch 2, PS4, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Switch 2, Switch)
      • Collector’s Edition (PS5, Switch 2, Switch)
  • Run for Money: Hunters vs. Runners! Can You Win as Either? (Switch 2, Switch)
  • Super Noda Game PARTY & WORLD (Switch)
  • Two Point Museum (Switch 2) – Already available digitally worldwide.

Digital-Only

  • BROK: The Brawl Bar (PS5, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Cloudheim Early Access (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • FEROCIOUS (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Flotsam (PC [Steam, GOG]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Ghost Town (PS VR2) – Launching worldwide.
  • Kingdom of Night (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • MARVEL Cosmic Invasion (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Mist (PS5, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny (Switch 2) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch 2)
    • European Version (Switch 2)
  • Night Swarm (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • Octopath Traveler 0 (Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Pirates Outlaws II: Heritage Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • POPUCOM (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Red Dead Redemption (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • ROUTINE (Xbox Series, Xbox One, PC [Steam, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Sacrifice for Sale (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • She’s Leaving (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • SLEEP AWAKE (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Switch 2) – Launching worldwide.
  • Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow (PS VR2, SteamVR, Quest 2, Quest 3) – Launching worldwide.
  • Viewfinder (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Whiskey Mafia: Blacklist (PS5, PS4) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

Demos, Betas, Updates, etc.

  • Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora “Third-Person Update” (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 Downloadable Content Character Zenitsu Agatsuma (Infinity Castle) (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Destiny 2: Renegades Expansion (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Fallout 76 “Burning Springs” Update (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Genshin Impact Version Luna III Update “Song of the Welkin Moon: Interlude – A Nocturne of the Far North” (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, PC, iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • Gran Turismo 7 Downloadable Content “Power Pack” (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • HITMAN World of Assassination Elusive Target mission “Eminem vs. Slim Shady” (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC, iOS) – Launching worldwide.
  • MARVEL Tokon Closed Beta #2 (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • Meg’s Monster Downloadable Content “Lost Memories” (PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Tekken 8 Downloadable Content Character Miary Zo (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Two Point Museum Downloadable Content “Zooseum” (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) – Launching worldwide.

item.title: Where Winds Meet for iOS, Android launches December 12 in the west
item.content:encoded:
The iOS and Android versions of Where Winds Meet first launched on January 9 in China, following the game’s December 27, 2024 release on PC in the region.

About

Where Winds Meet is an epic open-world action adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

An Era on the Brink. A Hero on the Rise

Explore China’s Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, where political intrigue, power struggles, and epic battles shape the course of history. From the bustling heart of the imperial capital to the hidden corners of forgotten wilderness, every path is layered with secrets, sights, and stories waiting to be discovered.

Who are you—a hero, or an agent of chaos?

Here, freedom is yours, but every action has its weight. Cause chaos, defy the law, and face bounties, pursuit, even time behind bars. Or walk a nobler path: befriend villagers, forge alliances, and grow your reputation as a hero of the Wuxia world. In a world torn by chaos, become the spark that ignites change and forge your legacy!

An Open World of Infinite Possibilities

From bustling cities to forgotten temples hidden deep within emerald forests, the world flows with life—changing with time, weather, and your actions.

Traverse vast landscapes in Wuxia style: scale rooftops with fluid parkour, ride the windstride across miles in moments, or use fast travel points to leap between regions.

Uncover thousands of points of interests, discover over 20 distinct regions, interact with diverse characters, and engage with numerous authentic activities in a world that teems with life. Explore ancient cities, reveal forbidden tombs, play flutes beneath swaying willows, or drink under lantern-lit skies.

Master Your Way of Wuxia Combat

Build your fighting style to match your rhythm—whether you thrive in the heart of melee, strike from afar, or move unseen in the shadows. Choose how you engage, and build a loadout that supports your playstyle.

Take control of fluid, responsive martial arts combat built around classic wuxia weaponry, skills, and strategy. Wield weapons both familiar and legendary—sword, spear, dual blades, glaive, fan and umbrella. Switch between weapons, bows, and mystic martial arts like Taichi to outmaneuver your enemies.

Create and customize your character and progression, choose your role in a fractured world. Align with powerful factions, explore distinct professions, and forge your identity through your actions.

Adventure Alone or Forge Your Community

Embark on a rich, narrative-driven adventure with over 150 hours of solo gameplay, or open your world to up to 4 friends in seamless co-op.

Build or join a Guild to unlock a wide range of group activities—from intense guild wars to challenging multiplayer dungeons and epic raids.

Prove your might in competitive duels, or step into a shared, ever-evolving world with thousands of fellow adventurers.

Watch a new trailer below.
